ValidationRule.description: This rule prevent Status from reverting back to previous stage after certain Status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($User.ProfileId<>'00eo0000000wf4I',RecordType.DeveloperName ='IMIT',ISCHANGED(Status__c),OR(TEXT(Status__c)='Pending Approval',TEXT(Status__c)='In Review',TEXT(Status__c)='Submitted',TEXT(Status__c)='Draft',TEXT(Status__c)='Approved by GM',TEXT(Status__c)='Approved by City Council',TEXT(Status__c)='With Legal',TEXT(Status__c)='Legal Agreement Completed',TEXT(Status__c)='Reassessment',TEXT(Status__c)='Amending Agreement'),ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c),'Compliance/Payment Review'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status can not be moved back to previous value.
